per_frame_11=treb_avg = tic*(treb_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*treb);

per_frame_13=bass_avg = tic*(bass_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*bass);

per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=tt = tt + tic*treb;
per_frame_17=mt = mt + tic*mid;
per_frame_18=bt = bt + tic*bass;
